scripts.test: cd tests/unit && npx vitest  --run --config vitest.config.ts && cd ../..
scripts.test:w: cd tests/unit && npx vitest --watch  --config vitest.config.ts && cd ../..
scripts.test:ui: cd tests/unit && npx vitest --ui  --config vitest.config.ts && cd ../..
scripts.e2e: cd tests/e2e && npx playwright test && cd ../..
scripts.e2e-ui: cd tests/e2e && npx playwright test --ui && cd ../..
